Title: Establishes a housing trust fund for individuals with limited resources
Summary: Establishes a housing trust fund for individuals with limited resources; establishes the membership of the board of trustees that are responsible to oversee the trust.
LawCode: Add ยง45-d, Priv Hous Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the private housing finance law, in relation to creating a housing trust fund for individuals with limited resources
